item.title: Moscow shrugs off Trump's irritation with Putin
item.description: On Ukraine, Vladimir Putin wants more than Donald Trump has been prepared to offer, writes BBC Russia editor Steve Rosenberg.

item.title: French police raid on National Rally HQ prompts outrage from party leaders
item.description: Party president Jordan Bardella complains of an "unprecedented operation", as prosecutors investigate alleged fraud.

item.title: 'Shoot in the leg' - Kenyan leader orders police to curb violent protests
item.description: Government will not stand by and watch businesses and lives destroyed by sponsored rioters, Ruto says.

item.title: Ukraine suffers heaviest attack as Trump criticises Putin
item.description: The US president reverses a suspension of weapons shipments to Kyiv and heavily criticises Russia's Putin.

item.title: US cuts visa validity for most Nigerian applicants
item.description: The United States announces sweeping changes to its non-immigrant visa policy for Nigeria.
